# [Interview #1052: WOR Signing Table Q&A, Entry #35](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1052#35)

#### Question

Are you ever going to go further in the
*Elantris*
series?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Someday I will. It's a ways off, but I will someday.
